T02D3193:202b-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug par rnam par bsgoms la //
T02D3193:202b-6: padma dang zla ba la sa bon t'am yongs su
T02D3193:202b-7: gyur pa las sa bon t'am gi snying po dang
T02D3193:202b-9: de dag las yongs su grub pa'i sngon mo don
T02D3193:202b-10: yod grub pa dbu rgyan la gnas pa phyag g-yas
T02D3193:202b-11: dang g-yon gyis mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02D3193:202b-13: mya ngan med la dga' ma dang /
T02D3193:202b-14: 'od zer can dang ral gcig ma mdun dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi sa'i cha la ste /
T02D3193:202b-15: lha'i bu mo gzhon nu rgyan rnams dang ldan par bsgoms la /
T02D3193:202b-16: ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig tu byas te /
T02D3193:202b-17: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3193:202b-18: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la /
T02D3193:202b-19: de yid la byed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par rgyu bar bya ba'o //
T02D3193:202b-20: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so /
